name: 系统配置管理查询模板字典
description: 系统配置、安全配置、AI模型配置、点赞收集配置、系统日志等系统配置管理相关表的查询模板

系统配置总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM system_configs WHERE deleted_at IS NULL

系统配置分组统计.sql: SELECT group_key, COUNT(*) as count FROM system_configs WHERE deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY group_key ORDER BY count DESC
系统配置分组统计.description: 统计系统配置分组分布
系统配置分组统计.response: 系统配置分组统计完成

系统级配置.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM system_configs WHERE is_system = 1 AND deleted_at IS NULL

只读配置统计.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM system_configs WHERE is_readonly = 1 AND deleted_at IS NULL

配置值类型统计.sql: SELECT value_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM system_configs WHERE deleted_at IS NULL GROUP BY value_type ORDER BY count DESC

本月更新配置.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM system_configs WHERE YEAR(updated_at) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(updated_at) = MONTH(NOW()) AND deleted_at IS NULL
本月更新配置.description: 查询本月更新的配置数量

安全配置总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM security_configs

活跃安全配置.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM security_configs WHERE isActive = 1
活跃安全配置.description: 查询活跃安全配置数量

安全配置分类统计.sql: SELECT category, COUNT(*) as count FROM security_configs GROUP BY category ORDER BY count DESC
安全配置分类统计.description: 统计安全配置分类分布
安全配置分类统计.response: 安全配置分类统计完成

本月更新安全配置.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM security_configs WHERE YEAR(updatedAt) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(updatedAt) = MONTH(NOW())
本月更新安全配置.description: 查询本月更新的安全配置数量

AI模型配置总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM ai_model_config

AI模型提供商统计.sql: SELECT provider, COUNT(*) as count FROM ai_model_config GROUP BY provider ORDER BY count DESC

AI模型类型统计.sql: SELECT model_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM ai_model_config GROUP BY model_type ORDER BY count DESC

默认AI模型.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM ai_model_config WHERE is_default = 1

活跃AI模型.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM ai_model_config WHERE status = 'active'

AI模型令牌限制分析.sql: SELECT AVG(max_tokens) as avg_tokens, MIN(max_tokens) as min_tokens, MAX(max_tokens) as max_tokens FROM ai_model_config WHERE max_tokens IS NOT NULL
AI模型令牌限制分析.response: AI模型令牌限制分析完成

点赞收集配置总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM like_collect_config
点赞收集配置总数.description: 查询点赞收集配置总数
点赞收集配置总数.response: 点赞收集配置总数为{count}个

点赞收集奖励统计.sql: SELECT reward_type, COUNT(*) as count, SUM(reward_amount) as total_reward FROM like_collect_config GROUP BY reward_type ORDER BY count DESC
点赞收集奖励统计.description: 统计点赞收集奖励情况
点赞收集奖励统计.response: 点赞收集奖励统计完成

点赞目标分析.sql: SELECT AVG(target_likes) as avg_target, MIN(target_likes) as min_target, MAX(target_likes) as max_target FROM like_collect_config

活跃点赞配置.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM like_collect_config WHERE status = 'active'
活跃点赞配置.description: 查询活跃点赞配置数量

系统日志总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM system_logs

系统日志级别统计.sql: SELECT level, COUNT(*) as count FROM system_logs GROUP BY level ORDER BY count DESC
系统日志级别统计.description: 统计系统日志级别分布
系统日志级别统计.response: 系统日志级别统计完成

系统日志分类统计.sql: SELECT category, COUNT(*) as count FROM system_logs GROUP BY category ORDER BY count DESC
系统日志分类统计.description: 统计系统日志分类分布
系统日志分类统计.response: 系统日志分类统计完成

错误日志统计.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM system_logs WHERE level = 'error'

本月系统日志.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM system_logs WHERE YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(created_at) = MONTH(NOW())
本月系统日志.description: 查询本月系统日志数量

系统日志来源统计.sql: SELECT source, COUNT(*) as count FROM system_logs WHERE source IS NOT NULL GROUP BY source ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10
系统日志来源统计.description: 统计系统日志来源分布
系统日志来源统计.response: 系统日志来源统计完成

系统配置管理概览.sql: SELECT 'system_configs' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM system_configs WHERE deleted_at IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT 'security_configs' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM security_configs UNION ALL SELECT 'ai_model_config' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM ai_model_config UNION ALL SELECT 'like_collect_config' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM like_collect_config UNION ALL SELECT 'system_logs' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM system_logs
系统配置管理概览.description: 系统配置管理数据总览
系统配置管理概览.response: 系统配置管理概览查询完成
